title: Font identification trouble.
content:
Good day, typophiles. I was wondering if anyone could help me identify this font. I know I’ve seen it somewhere before, but I can’t seem to put my finger on it.

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v150/unmei\_shinpai/g2lof-phoenix-wrigh...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060540/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v150/unmei_shinpai/g2lof-phoenix-wright.png "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v150/unmei\_shinpai/g2lof-phoenix-wright.png")  
(Trying to identify the font in ’Ace Attorney’)

Any help would be appreciated. I also cropped it down and put it through whatthefont as well as a few other font recognition websites with no luck. I have no idea how those work, so it could possibly be the large stroke around the lettering cause it to give me funny results. Who knows.

 [‹ Sang Bleu zine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060540/http:/typophile.com/node/40821 "Go to previous forum topic") [radiohead / in rainbows / front cover type / ??? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060540/http:/typophile.com/node/45825 "Go to next forum topic")
author: eeht

comments.content:
Looks like a squooshed Georgia Bold to me.

- Lex
